name: Slimey Disposition (Skill Card)
skill_activation: Flip this card over when you activate this Skill.
skill_effect:
Once per turn, you can Special Summon 1 "Humanoid Slime" or 1 "Worm Drake" from your GY in Attack Position, but it cannot be Tributed, except for the Tribute Summon of a Divine-Beast monster.
Once per turn, you can discard 1 card, then Fusion Summon 1 "Humanoid Worm Drake" using either "Worm Drake" or "Humanoid Slime" from your field as 1 of the Fusion Materials, and the other material from your Deck.
